author: Odeinoichus
title: My Diagnosis is Grim. Grimly Hillarious that is.
review:
Set #71009 Dr. Hibbert: The family doctor has joined the denizens of Springfield in LEGO form and he's got loads of personality.

Dr. Hibbert has an awesome torso which is really quite useful, there aren't that many doctor prints in LEGO form after all and this one isn't specific to any one character, it's a buttoned up shirt with an undershirt and a tie and a stethescope hanging around the neck. The overshirt/overcoat print carries on to the legs showing the bottom of the Doctor's outfit. His head sculpt is also very impressive with a huge grin and a pleasent expression on his face. Homer's X-Ray is printed on the 1x4 tile piece and it looks stunning, matching up with what fans know from the series.

Overall Dr. Hibbert is a must have minifigure and has great useful parts for fans of MOCing hospitals and Doctors for your own creations. Highly recommended.
